select a.aboardNo, a.meetno, a.clubId, a.memberId, a.boardContent, a.title, TO_CHAR(a.aboardDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') aboardDate , a.aboardVal, a.likeCnt, a.aboardHit, mn.maxPerson, mn.minPerson, av.voteNo, nvl(vt.voteYV, 0) voteYV, nvl(pc.paycount, 0) paycount
from aboard a, aVote av, meet_name mn, (select count(*) voteYV , voteNo from voteResult where memberId = #{memberId} group by voteNo ) vt, (select count(*) paycount, meetNo from payresult where memberId = #{memberId} group by meetNo ) pc WHERE a.aboardNo = av.aboardNo(+) and a.meetNo = mn.meetNo(+) and av.voteNo = vt.voteNo(+) and mn.meetNo = pc.meetNo(+) and (a.memberId LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR a.boardContent LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR a.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') order by aboardNo desc

mapper.select:
select a.aboardNo , c.clubId , m.memberId , a.aboardVal , a.title , TO_CHAR(aboardDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') aboardDate ,a.boardContent , aboardHit ,v.aboardNo , v.voteNo, v.voteTitle, v.vote1, v.vote2, v.vote3, v.vote4, v.vote5, v.totalNum, v.finDate ,(select count(memberId) from voteResult where memberId = #{memberId} and voteNo = v.voteNo) as voteYV ,vote1Cnt ,vote2Cnt ,vote3Cnt ,vote4Cnt ,vote5Cnt
from aboard a, club c, member m, avote v left outer join ( SELECT voteNo, SUM(CASE WHEN choice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vote1Cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN choice = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vote2Cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN choice = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vote3Cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN choice = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vote4Cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN choice = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vote5Cnt FROM voteResult WHERE voteNo = #{voteNo} GROUP BY voteNo) b on v.voteNo = b.voteNo where a.clubId = c.clubId and a.memberId = m.memberId and a.aboardNo = v.aboardNo and a.aboardNo = #{aboardNo}

select seq_voteNo.nextval from dual
insert into aVote(voteNo, aboardNo, voteTitle, vote1, vote2, vote3, vote4, vote5, totalNum, finDate) values(#{voteNo}, #{aboardNo}, #{voteTitle}, #{vote1}, #{vote2}, #{vote3}, #{vote4}, #{vote5}, #{totalNum}, #{finDate})
insert into voteResult(voteResult, voteNo, memberId, choice, voteDate) values(seq_voteResultNo.nextval, #{voteNo}, #{memberId}, #{choice}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select sum(case when choice = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as vote1Cnt ,sum(case when choice = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as vote2Cnt ,sum(case when choice = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as vote3Cnt ,sum(case when choice = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as vote4Cnt ,sum(case when choice = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as vote5Cnt from voteResult where voteNo = #{voteNo}
